trait.name: (Striker) Savage Assault.
entries: Once per turn, add your level in extra damage to an attack.

trait.name: Shifty.
entries: You can Disengage as a bonus action.

action.name: Slash.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit,   {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Knockback.
entries: : The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. {@h}the target is pushed up to 10 ft away.

trait.name: (Sniper) Ricochet.
entries: If your attack misses, you can spend your reaction to make another attack against a different target of your choice within 15ft of the original target.

trait.name: Aura: Entangle.
entries: The ground in a 10 ft radius around you is difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Spit Thorn
entries: {@rtk mw} {@hit 4} to hit,   {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage. On an odd numbered-hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution check or be {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Poison Spray
entries: {@dice d3 + 1} targets in a group must succeed on a [primary-dc] Dexterity saving throw or take {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and a [primary-dc] Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Fiery Rage.
entries: If the Vine Zombie is on fire, it gets +10 to its initiative, doubles its speed and gets advantage to attacks, Dexterity saving throws and defense against opportunity attacks.

trait.name: (Controller) Distraction.
entries: Halve your attack damage to grant advantage to the next attack roll made against the target.

action.name: Claw Swipe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit,   {@h}8 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Vine Bind
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. {@h}4 ({@damage 2d6}) damage and the target is {@condition restrained}. Each time the target fails its saving throw, it takes 4 damage.

trait.name: Shifty
entries: You can Disengage as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spore Burst
entries: Each time the Spore Bat is hit, hallucinogenic spores are dispensed. Those within 10 feet of the bat must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or is confused.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit,   {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Screech
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d6}) damage and the target suffers{@dice  - d4} to its next ability checks or attack.

trait.name: Damage Transfer.
entries: When you take damage from an attack, you can transfer half of the damage to another creature within 5 ft of you.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement.
entries: You ignore difficult terrain, and magical effects canâ€™t reduce your speed or cause it to be restrained. You can spend 5 ft of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

trait.name: Inscrutable.
entries: You are immune to any effect that would sense your emotions or read your thoughts, as well as any divination spell that you refuse. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain your intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Spellcasting.
entries: The Starspawn can uses an action to make an attack from any soul puppet that it controls. It can also use the action of any puppet to cast a spell, though that puppet grants advantage to all attack rolls against it.

trait.name: Alien Mind.
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

action.name: Burning Hands (red)
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. Hit: d3 targets take fire 10 (2d6 + 3). Spend {@h}1 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (blue)
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. Hit: 1 target up to 60 ft. away take {@h}12 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage. Spend {@h}1 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Horrid Wilting (black)
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. Hit: 1 target up to 60 ft. away take {@h}12 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. Spend {@h}1 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Ray of Weakness (white)
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. Hit: 1 target up to 60 ft. away take {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage and take disadvantage on Strength ability checks and attacks. If the target is wearing heavy armor, it speeds is halved. Spend {@h}1 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Beguiling Cloud (silver)
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. Hit: d3 targets target up to 15 ft. away take {@h}8 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage and is unable to use spells or any class features. Spend {@h}1 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Evil Eye (gold)
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw. Hit: 1 target up to 30 ft. away take {@h}5 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and it makes an attack with its weapon or cantrips against the nearest ally. Spend {@h}1 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

trait.name: (Defender) You Canâ€™t Leave.
entries: Targets always provoke opportunity attacks, even if they take the Disengage action before leaving your reach. In addition, when you hit with an opportunity attack, the targetâ€™s speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit,   {@h}4 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: When charging, gain advantage to attacks, disadvantage on AC. Knockdown will do 3.5 additional damage.

trait.name: Shifty
entries: You can _Disengage_ as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite and Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 vs AC. _Hit:_ 7 slashing damage. If the roll is even, the next attack against the same target has advantage as it held on to the target.

action.name: Knockdown
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:_ {@dc 13} vs Strength. _Hit:_ takes 3.5 blunt damage and the target is knocked {@condition prone}

action.name: Fiery Breath
entries: Close Quarter_:{@dc 13} vs Dexterty, {@dice d3 + 1} targets in a group. _Hit:_ 7 fire damage _Miss_: Half damage. _Hit by 5+:_ Ongoing 3 fire damage.
